Title: Road Trip
Writer: Brett Johnson, Ann Biderman (creator), Alyona Khmara
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Avi brings Sully back from LA. However, Sully is not traveling alone, he brings his better half with him. Avi's journey becomes ever more troublesome, as the Sullivans and their dog cause ...
